=== Import a shape-file

[source,cypher]
----
CALL spatial.addWKTLayer('geom','wkt')
----

[source,cypher]
----
CALL spatial.importShapefileToLayer('geom', 'example-data/shp/highway.shp')
----

.Result

[opts="header",cols="1"]
|===
|count
a|
[source]
----
143
----

|===

[source,cypher]
----
CALL spatial.layers()
----

.Result

[opts="header",cols="2"]
|===
|name|signature
|geom|EditableLayer(name='geom', encoder=WKTGeometryEncoder(geom='wkt', bbox='bbox'))
|===
